definition.name: Container image scan
definition.description: Scan container images for vulnerabilities and CIS guidelines
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: severity-threshold
inputs.description: (Optional) Minimum severity threshold set to control flagging of the vulnerabilities found during the scan. The available levels are: (UNKNOWN, LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, CRITICAL); if you set the severity-threshold to be `MEDIUM` every CVE found of a level higher than or equal to `MEDIUM` would be displayed

inputs.name: username
inputs.description: Username to authenticate to the Docker registry

inputs.name: password
inputs.description: Password to authenticate to the Docker registry

inputs.name: run-quality-checks
inputs.description: Add additional checks to ensure the image is secure and follows best practices and CIS standards

outputs.name: scan-report-path
outputs.description: File path where the scan results are stored

outputs.name: check-run-url
outputs.description: URL of the check run. Overview about finding of vulnerabilities and best-practices.

latest_release.name: New output variable for checkrun URL
